content: crochet catnip mouse toy yarn - medium worsted weight crochet hook - e 4 3 5mm catnip scissors text single_crochet - single_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet tc - triple crochet sc2t - single_crochet two stitches together pattern this pattern is worked in the round magic loop r1- 4sc into the magic loop pull tight r2 - 1sc in each stitch 4 total r3 - 2sc in each stitch 8 total r4 - *1sc in first stitch 2sc in next* repeat 3 more times 12 total r5 - 1sc in each stitch 12 total r6 - this is the round where you make the ears in the first stitch do 1sc 2dc 1tc in the second stitch 1tc 2dc 1sc in third stitch 1sc in fourth stitch 1sc 2dc 1tc in fifth stitch 1tc 2dc 1sc i m next seven stitches do 1sc r7 - 1sc into the bottom of the first ear you will then go behind the ear and do 1sc in the middle post of the two stitches that make up the ear so the post in the row below between the two triple crochets see photo 1sc in the next single_crochet at the bottom of the ear 1sc in next stitch between ears 1sc in next single_crochet at bottom of second ear 1sc in the post between the two triple crochets 1sc in bottom of next single_crochet in other ear this will make 7 stitches behind the ears see photos 1sc in next 7 stitches 14 total by end r8 - 1sc in whole round 14 stitches r9 - 2sc in next stitch 1sc in next stitch 2sc in next stitch 1sc in next stitch 2sc in next stitch 1sc in next stitch 2sc in next stitch 1sc in next seven stitches 18 total r10 - r13 - 1sc in each stitch 18 total r14 - *1sc in next two stitches sc2t* repeat 3 more times sc2t 13 total r15 - *1sc in next stitch sc2t* repeat 3 more times sc2t 9 total at this point add your catnip and fluff if you want it i don t add fluff my cats like their prey flat r16- sc2t until you have only 4 stitches left insert crochet hook through the middle of the round and pull up into a single_crochet as long as the hole is semi closed where you do this doesn t matter chain 10-12 for tail cut yarn and pull through last chain to make a knot i leave the tail hanging but you can sew it in if needed
